name: Battlegun
description: Battlegun is a fun and online cartoon fps game. Create a room and kill the rival team. See more fun on multiple maps. Play now!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP,7,8,8.1,10 Processor: Pentium 4 2000MHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 5700 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP,7,8,8.1,10 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 250GTS DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space
